abstract: As Yahoo posted a decline in revenue and profit during the first three months of the year, the company’s chief executive, Carol A. Bartz, remained guarded on the subject that investors have been most focused on: The progress of talks with Microsoft over an advertising partnership, which have heated up recently.
lead_paragraph: As Yahoo posted a decline in revenue and profit during the first three months of the year, the company’s chief executive, Carol A. Bartz, remained guarded on the subject that investors have been most focused on: The progress of talks with Microsoft over an advertising partnership, which have heated up recently.

headline.main: Yahoo Remains Mum on Microsoft Talks
